Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\patri\\Documents\\claudeProjects" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Streamlit web dashboard with interactive Plotly charts

- Create app.py: Streamlit dashboard with ticker input, period selection,
  chart type toggle \(candlestick/line\), and moving average controls
- Add Plotly chart functions: create_plotly_candlestick\(\), create_plotly_line\(\)
  for interactive browser-based charts with zoom, pan, hover
- Display company info, price data, key metrics, and performance stats
- Keep mplfinance functions for CLI/static image use
- Update dependencies.md with streamlit \(1.53.0\), plotly \(6.5.2\)
- Mark interactive charts as complete in ROADMAP.md

Run with: streamlit run stock_analysis/app.py

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
